attributes.action: Force Theresa May to resign and call a General Election
attributes.additional_details: The Tory government have broken Britain under her premiership. Democracy demands we have the right to vote  Grenfell disaster, Windrush hostile environment and Cambridge Analytica scandals & Carillion collapse, homelessness crisis, rise in child poverty, cuts to Police & rise in violent crime. Drug related deaths highest since records began, NHS, Transport and Education department all in crisis, Universal Credit and conscious cruelty. Zero hours contracts, poverty wages and the Brexit shambles.
attributes.background:
There is a squatter in No 10. Any modern day Prime Minister that suffered a colossal historical defeat in the House of Commons like the Brexit deal would  resign. 
May has shown no leadership and since the start of her premiership has shown a complete lack of judgement, arrogance & incompetence.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job.

If you would like a general election you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
